trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> class is used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control to functionally represent a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> 類別 (Class) 可供 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項使用，以表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> 的功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl>, which means it renders a user interface composed of many other Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl>，的也就是說，它會呈現使用者介面組成許多其他 Web 伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control works directly with the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap> configured for your site and its <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects are not Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>直接搭配運作的控制項<xref:System.Web.SiteMap>設定您的網站和其<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>物件，<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>物件不是 Web 伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> class is a Web server control wrapper for the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> class, which enables the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control to display <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> data while maintaining the functional distinction between a generic navigation data item and a user interface item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>類別是 Web 伺服器控制項包裝函式<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>類別，這可讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項來顯示<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>資料，同時維護一般導覽資料的項目與使用者之間的功能差異介面項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control maintains the site map nodes in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection internally.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項維護中的站台對應節點及其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合內部。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> can render its child controls with different styles, templates, and orders, it must be able to distinguish between functionally different types of nodes, regardless of display order.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>可以具有不同的樣式、 範本和訂單控制項轉譯它的子系，它必須能夠區分不同的功能類型的節點，顯示的順序為何。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created with a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>建立與特定的型別。

trans-unit.source: (Possible types are listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType> enumeration.)
trans-unit.target: (可能的類型會列在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType>列舉型別。)

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> class directly in your code only if you plan to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control or write a control with similar functionality.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>類別直接在您的程式碼中，只有當您計劃來擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制或撰寫具有類似功能的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create and manipulate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> objects within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method of a class that derives from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立及操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>物件內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>衍生自類別的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>類別。

trans-unit.source: The index in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> collection that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control uses to track the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> 集合中的索引，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項使用這個索引來追蹤 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The functional type of <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> 所表示的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> 功能型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> class, using the specified index and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的索引和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathDirection%2A> is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection.RootToCurrent>, you can add each deeper-level item of the site navigation hierarchy at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathDirection%2A>是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection.RootToCurrent>，您可以加入的站台瀏覽階層的每個更深層級項目結尾處<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathDirection%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection.CurrentToRoot>, each deeper-level node must be inserted at the beginning of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathDirection%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection.CurrentToRoot>，更深層級的每個節點必須在開頭插入<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>物件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>類別。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control uses to track and manage the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> in its internal collections.
trans-unit.target: 擷取索引，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項使用這個索引，在其內部集合中追蹤及管理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" />。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the location of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control's internal collections.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項內部集合中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to get the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.ItemIndex%2A> property and use it to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> path separator.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.ItemIndex%2A>屬性，並用來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>路徑分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator> node items are created at the same index as the previous node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator> 節點的項目會建立在相同的索引，做為前一個節點。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>類別。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the functional type of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> 的功能型別。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType" /> enumeration that indicates the functional role of the node item in the navigation path hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType" /> 列舉型別的成員，表示節點項目在巡覽路徑階層架構中的功能角色。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> objects that have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator> type are not bound to a corresponding <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> 物件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator>類型未繫結至相對應<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to check the type of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.ItemType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查的類型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.ItemType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the only node type that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method handles is the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.CurrentNode%2A> type.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，唯一的節點型別，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>方法控制代碼是<xref:System.Web.SiteMap.CurrentNode%2A>型別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>類別。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /><see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.ItemType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /><see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.ItemType" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> 所表示的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control uses to display a site navigation user interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> 物件，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項使用這個物件來顯示網站巡覽使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.SiteMapNode%2A> property gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is bound to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.SiteMapNode%2A>屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>繫結至。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> objects that have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator> type are not bound to a corresponding <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> 物件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator>類型未繫結至相對應<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to get the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.SiteMapNode%2A> property and access the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.SiteMapNode%2A>屬性和存取<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A>和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the larger example provided for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是提供較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that is used in simplified data-binding operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得簡化資料繫結作業中所使用的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the value to use when data-binding operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示執行資料繫結作業時所使用的值。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.SiteMapNode%2A> property to access the data item represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.SiteMapNode%2A>屬性來存取項目所代表之資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.System%23Web%23UI%23IDataItemContainer%23DataItem%2A> member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.System%23Web%23UI%23IDataItemContainer%23DataItem%2A>成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the data item that is bound to the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得繫結至控制項之資料項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the location of the data item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control's internal collections.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示資料項目在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項內部集合中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.ItemIndex%2A> property to determine the index for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.ItemIndex%2A>屬性來判斷針對索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.System%23Web%23UI%23IDataItemContainer%23DataItemIndex%2A> member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.System%23Web%23UI%23IDataItemContainer%23DataItemIndex%2A>成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the data item as displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項中所顯示之資料項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the location of the data item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control's internal collections.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示資料項目在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項內部集合中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.ItemIndex%2A> property to determine the index for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.ItemIndex%2A>屬性來判斷針對索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.System%23Web%23UI%23IDataItemContainer%23DisplayIndex%2A> member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem.System%23Web%23UI%23IDataItemContainer%23DisplayIndex%2A>成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
